about_the_game:
I'm Not Happy is a singleplayer, post-horror exploration game that gives you the opportunity to unravel the events that've taken place in a seemingly normal home.

There's nothing quite like human curiosity. Fear is instinctual when presented with something uncertain, unfamiliar, and uncommon; there's something ticking away in the deep recesses of the mind that make us question the same thing that invokes fear.

Now the only option is to chase the morbid curiosity that envelops you, to uncover the secrets in the rooms that lay before you.

  • Post-horror Experience: a small game that you can enjoy (or not) in a couple of hours on a dark evening, for those who feel fear or those who don't
  • Interactive Environment: no combat, no puzzles; just a tale to unweave through interacting with various items in the environment
  • Fully Narrated: a character that experiences the story with you, through responsive voice acting
  • Totally Independent: the first ambitious project from Dark Comforts; a small, one-person studio with a story to tell
